channel.title: How to do Suggestions on the Forums!
channel.description:
# General Game Suggestions! If you are suggestion to nerf/buff something and don't want it to be lost in the shitshow that is #feedback in Discord, you should post it here.
It should be, At least a good 3 sentences, 2 if it is a small suggestion like (X shouldn't be able to do Y with Z ability as it's AA) In the right category, see that thing by the title of the thread? You can pick the category there! It isn't that hard..
# Good General Game Suggestion Examples! (DISCLAIMER: I do not agree with all of these, I just think they were well written)
[Please do NOT add a ranked mode (By Tiny Deer)](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/please-do-not-add-a-ranked-mode/33151)
[The King's Allies- They gotta go (By Livicus)](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/the-kings-allies-they-gotta-go/34445/1)
# Bad General Game Suggestions! (DISCLAIMER: I have nothing against these people, just the way they post feedback suggestions)
[Please Remove Decide Fate From King (by Eran_Shmuel)](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/please-remove-decide-fate-from-king/35080/1)
So with these things in mind, please be like the first two suggestions. Not the last one.
(NOTE: I am making this post out of frusteration, I've seen way too many bad suggestion formats around the forums)
